protocol.text: The microarray data were analyzed using the R package affy (affy_1.34.0) from Bioconductor. The MAS5 method was used. ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 MAS5.0 signal intensity
All plants were grown at 23 degrees C under continuous light.

RNAs were isolated from wild-type and TOP1a-2 inflorescences. Inflorescences were ground and extracted with the TRI Reagent (Molecular Research Center). RNA was precipitated by isopropanol and treated with DNaseI (Roche) to eliminate contaminating DNA.
Affymetrix ATH1 arrays were hybridized in three biological replicates according to the manufacturer's instructions.
